name: glowing tendril
description: A willowy tendril growing from the floor, gently waving back and forth.  A faint illumination spills from it.

name: wafting anemone
description: A fleshy white protuberance growing from the floor, with a cluster of tendrils pouring out of it.  It looks almost exactly like a sea anemone, even waving gently as though in the water.

bash.//: Variable reduction since might hit more or less material.

name: clogged-up wafting anemone
description: A fleshy white protuberance growing from the floor, with a cluster of tendrils pouring out of it.  Someone's sabotaged it, pouring alien resin over its tendrils to halt its emissions.

name: gasping tube
description: This is a meaty green stalactite with a thickened hide like that of a starfish, extending from the floor to the ceiling.  In the center is a series of ports somewhat like mouths, from which pour bursts of a vile smelling gas.
//: TODO: Make a custom toxic gas emission that is not visible to the player

bash.//: Variable reduction since might hit more or less material.

name: clogged-up gasping tube
description: This is a meaty green stalactite with a thickened hide like that of a starfish.  Someone's sabotaged it, pouring alien resin into every hole they could find to grind its constant noxious emissions to a near-halt.

name: twitching frond
description: A spine like the antenna of a moth juts from the ground, swaying gently in the air.  Every so often, a cascade of energy arcs along it and discharges into the ceiling.
//: TODO: Make a custom toxic gas emission that is not visible to the player

name: scarred lump
description: This is a pile of unidentified twitching alien flesh, belching strange gases out of injured vessels.
//: TODO: Make a custom toxic gas emission that is not visible to the player

bash.//: reduction matches that of weakest furniture that turns into this when destroyed

name: clogged-up scarred lump
description: This is a pile of unidentified twitching alien flesh.  Someone's done even more to sabotage it, plugging this gaping wound in the alien hive full of resin to stop it from leaking alien gases.

name: seeping scar
description: This is a small patch of mangled alien flesh, wisps of strange gases leaking out of collapsed tissue.

name: clogged-up scarred lump
description: This is a small patch of mangled alien flesh, sabotaged even further by being given a heavy coating of resin to stop it from leaking noxius gases.

name: slimy pod
description: This is a slick, translucent pod suspended on a thin stalk.  It is covered in a thick mucus, obscuring whatever is floating in the gel-like substance inside.  You could fairly easily tear it from the stalk and see if anything is inside.

bash.//: Variable reduction since might hit more or less material.

name: organ pod
description: This is a translucent pod suspended on a thin stalk.  Inside you can see the dimly outlined shape of human organs, floating in some kind of preservative goo.  You could fairly easily tear it from the stalk and see if anything is inside.

bash.//: Variable reduction since might hit more or less material.

name: resin pod
description: This is a translucent pod suspended on a thin stalk.  Inside is a clean, clear resinous-looking fluid.  You could fairly easily tear it from the stalk and take it with you.

bash.//: Variable reduction since might hit more or less material.

name: fleshy altar
description: This pulsing protuberance juts from the floor, its sides covered in scaled, oozing skin.  The surface is flat, but undulates softly.  A handful of unidentifiable appendages reach from the sides, suggesting a sort of nightmarish living autodoc.

bash.//: Variable reduction since might hit more or less material.

name: nerve cluster
description: A bundle of molded resin encasing alien flesh, connected to the ceiling by thick bundles of nerves.  It must control some part of this alien structure, tearing the right piece out might short something.  Then again, the way it breathes and twitches suggests it might be risky to mess with…

bash.//: Variable reduction, destroy_threshold equal to str_min instead of str_max due to delicate wetware, and a pissed-off alien bug installed inside
